frontmatter.title: Research PhD Intern
frontmatter.description: • Developed an on‑device (Android, Snapdragon 765G) inference pipeline for video processing and assembly using a visual‑language model. Leveraged PyTorch Quantization and PyTorch Mobile to achieve approximately 3× lower peak memory consumption. </br> • Refactored the visual‑language model to support statically‑typed forward passes and data‑dependent control flows, reducing inference latency by 16.67%. Additionally optimized memory consumption through operator fusion and parameter hoisting techniques.
